search_general_talk_04/4401_0701_0100_10: They literally come out of, like, rocks?
search_general_talk_04/4401_0701_0200_10:
Rocks that are brought here to Pasio change and
are said to become quite precious stones!
search_general_talk_04/4401_0701_0400_10:
We are seeking them out, as they play an
important role in the Evolution of Pokémon!
search_general_talk_04/4401_0702_0500_10:
I mean, like, the name “Evolution materials”
sounds like they’re really important?
So everybody wants them?
search_general_talk_04/4401_0702_0600_10:
Well then, Madame Punk, let us search out and
acquire all the Evolution materials for ourselves!
search_general_talk_04/4402_1031_0100_10:
Punches today!
Punches tomorrow!
Punches forever!
search_general_talk_04/4402_1031_0200_10: Discipline is a way of life!
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0100_10: Hey, you can’t touch this rock!
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0200_10:
Punches today, punches tomorrow, punches
forever! I live to punch my days away!
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0300_10:
Punches today, punches tomorrow, punches
forever! Hiyah! Heeyah!
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0500_10:
I punched my days away until my fists became
as hard as rock.
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0600_10:
Surely someday I will be able to pulverize this
rock with my fists!
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0700_10:
Yes, as I talk with you, I’m beginning to feel that
today is that day.
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0800_10:
All right! All right! Visualize it!
Prepare yourself mentally! All right! All right!
search_general_talk_04/4402_0702_1000_10:
No matter what the task at hand, if you stay
positive, you will find that you can awaken some
hidden power within yourself.
search_general_talk_04/4402_0702_1100_10: There is nothing that my fists can’t smash! Heeyah!
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_1200_10:
You smashed something even greater than
just rock...
search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_1400_10: Huh?! I can’t control my fists! Somebody stop me!
search_general_talk_04/4403_1031_0100_10:
I just have to wait until
no one is around, then...
search_general_talk_04/4403_1031_0300_10:
Wait, wait.
I need to calm down.
search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0100_10: Huh? Is this a dead end?
search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0300_10:
A dead end... Guess I should go look for some
other place to mine precious stones.
search_general_talk_04/4403_0702_0400_10:
Hmm...
This path being a dead end is a real bummer.
search_general_talk_04/4403_0702_0500_10:
What a shame! I’ve wasted so much time.
Not to mention my considerable talents!
search_general_talk_04/4403_0702_0600_10:
You should probably go look somewhere else.
Nothing to see here...
search_general_talk_04/4403_1032_0700_10:
The wall is gone, so I
guess everything is fine?
search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0700_10:
How did you know there was a secret
passage here?!
search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0800_10:
I was sure I had fooled you!
Can you read minds or something?!
search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0900_10: Well, I guess it can’t be helped.
search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_1000_10: We’ll split it! I’ll give you half! Yeah, half!
search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_1100_10:
If you take it all for yourself, I’m gonna get angry
for real!
search_general_talk_04/4701_1031_0100_10:
We used to have one of
those back home...
search_general_talk_04/4701_1031_0200_10:
Reminds me of when I
was just a youngster...
search_general_talk_04/4701_0101_0100_10:
When I look at this track, for some reason,
it makes me think of how I got here.
search_general_talk_04/4701_0101_0200_10:
I remember walking home along the tracks,
crying after my Rattata and I lost.
search_general_talk_04/4701_0101_0300_10:
That was a long, long time ago.
Have I evolved since then?
search_general_talk_04/4701_0301_0400_10: Let’s have a battle and find out!
search_general_talk_04/4701_0401_0500_10:
All right!
I’ll find the answer I’m looking for in battle!
search_general_talk_04/4701_0402_0700_10: Hahaha! Yes, of course. Why am asking you?
search_general_talk_04/4701_0102_0800_10:
Let me ask you once more: Do you think I’ve been
able to evolve since I was a youngster?
search_general_talk_04/4701_0501_0900_10:
Hahaha! I haven’t evolved at all! I never was any
good at Pokémon battles, no matter how much fun
I think they are...
search_general_talk_04/4701_0501_1000_10: And after all these years, I’m still battling.
search_general_talk_04/4701_0501_1100_10: I certainly did find something that I really love.
search_general_talk_04/4101_1001_0100_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve got some
information I think you’ll be interested in.
search_general_talk_04/4101_1001_0200_10:
I heard recently you can get some precious stones
in this area! Wanna go have a look?
search_general_talk_04/4101_1001_0300_10: I thought it’d be fun if we could go look together.
search_general_talk_04/4101_1001_0400_10:
I’ll go on ahead.
Come find me if you feel like joining in!
